text: The Ptsich, or Pcičofficial transliteration (, ) is a river in Eastern Europe. It flows south through Belarus, taking its source near Minsk, and draining into the Pripyat, being its left tributary. It is long, and has a drainage basin of .Птичь, Great Soviet Encyclopedia Its biggest tributary is the Aresa. == References == Category:Rivers of Gomel Region Category:Rivers of Mogilev Region Category:Rivers of Minsk Region Category:Rivers of Belarus
title: Ptsich
